page.title: 06Southill_my pony Charlie
page.content: Charlie is a New Forest pony.He is a bay and is 13 years old. I have had Charlie for a year.I keep him at Southfield Stables.Charlie lives out in a field which costs Â£2.50 a week.I buy a sack of feed once a month for Â£4.50.In the winter he needs 2 bales of hay a week.If for any reason he sleeps in his stable at night,for example:Pony Club rally the next day,hunting,or bad weather.I have to buy straw at 50p a bale.Mr Dyer from Martock shoes charlie about every 2 months for about Â£14.I buy equipment at Somerton Saddlery.My vet is Mr Ferguson.I go to shows,Pony Club rallies and hunting.Charlie eats:1 large scoop of bran,\ scoop of oats,1 scoop of soaked sugar beet and mineral powder.
